message: Let's split fairly, I'll take a bit more
My turn for a slightly better deal. This is a strong offer Alice, take it and we both win.
Still willing to compromise, but I won't go below this
Alice, let's be reasonable. This is almost an even split and it saves us both from losing more to inflation.
Getting closer to the middle ground, but I still think I deserve a bit more
Alice, this is it. A perfectly even split. Let's end this before inflation eats away any more of our potential winnings.
